thread.title: KC

author: KC
title: KC
text:
Easy online booking, good prices and quick service. Ordered online and tyre fitted next day. Good communications via email after purchase and prior to fitting. Contacted on day of fitting by Liam and excellent service from him. Checked other tyre treads on car. No hard sell (like there can be at a garage chain, eg "Your exhaust is leaking. We can replace it for Â£300!" PS just needed manifold bolts tightening!)
Anyway, I'm straying...they are spot on if you just need a tyre and to have it fitted at your home, work, wherever.
Quick, convenient and easy service from Tyresonthedrive. Never used before but will definitely use again.
